ej,jonet003,P,ripps901,Throwing at Dennis Martinez Todd Jones ejected by HP umpire Steve Rippley for throwing at Dennis Martinez; each of the four pitches got closer to Martinez, who stepped out of the batter's box on the last pitch

ej,howea001,M,ripps901,Throwing at Dennis Martinez with pickoff ej,osuna001,P,ripps901,Throwing at Dennis Martinez with pickoff $Astros 1B Jeff Bagwell was standing about 15 feet behind Dennis Martinez running at 1B; the throw by Al Osuna nearly hit Martinez on the foot; when catcher Eddie Taubensee went to the mound to talk with Osuna, HP umpire Steve Rippley followed; after a brief argument between Rippley and Osuna, the latter was ejected by Rippley; Astros manager Art Howe came out and was also ejected by Rippley
$the Astros obejected to the last pitch being aclled a strike; Luis Gonzalez and Astros coach Matt Galante followed HP umpire Steve Rippley into the tunnel behind home plate
